name: Adele Bloch-Bauer
description:
The then-eight-year-old came home from school one day.

"Weren't you just in Vienna?", he asked.

"Well, yes, last month," we answered.

"We talked about Vienna in art class today!", he said.

"Why? Did you talk about Gustav Klimt?"

"Yes! How did you know? And then we talked about his famous painting..."

"The Woman in Yellow?"

"Wow, dad! You really know a lot about art!"

Sure, we do! The very famous painting, was famous for being stolen by the Nazis. The family of its subject, Adele Bloch-Bauer, fought for a long time to recover it. When it sold, it became the most expensive painting in the world.

Boy, do we feel smart!

It's actually called "The Woman in Gold"...
